DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine single-dose pharmacokinetics investigational drug PL 3100 follow oral administration healthy volunteer compare pharmacokinetic profile PL 3100 naproxen prescription dose .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Bioequivalence Study PL 3100 Naproxen Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Age 1875 year , inclusive . Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20 32 , inclusive . Normal physical examination determine Investigator . Normal clinical laboratory test result clinically insignificant result determine Investigator screen visit . If female childbearing potential , subject must negative pregnancy test nursing . If female childbearing potential , subject must agree use adequate birth control duration study . Subject history chronic alcohol consumption abuse narcotic alcohol . Subject acute illness within 5 day study medication administration . Subject currently participate , participate within 30 day prior study entry , investigational drug study . Subject hypersensitivity contraindication naproxen , ibuprofen , NSAID .
